member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.VS.SolutionBuilder.VsSolutionBuilder.myIsReportingErrors
member.summary: This is a supplementary component to wind up VS builds and track their progress. Therefore, most of its warnings are non-fatal, even though we should be aware of them and should try to fix them. Set up by Ctor, tells whether we're reporting non-fatal errors.
